Plot: In the year before the 1904 St Louis World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.
Title: Meet Me in St. Louis
Writer: Irving Brecher (screen play), Fred F. Finklehoffe (screen play), Sally Benson (based on the novel by)
Actors: Judy Garland, Margaret O'Brien, Mary Astor, Lucille Bremer
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.
